[Desktop Entry]
Version=1.0
Encoding=UTF-8
Name=Zeronet Protocol Handler
Comment=Open ZeroNet links without a prefix
Exec=/home/<username-goes-here>/.local/share/applications/zeronet.desktop.sh
Terminal=false
Type=Application
Categories=Application;Internet;

paste.description: bash script to open zero:// links
paste.body:
#!/bin/bash

# This script relies on kaffie's zeronet.pac being already configured for you browser!

uri=$1

if [ "${uri:0:7}" == "zero://" ] ; then
  host=`echo "${uri:7}" | cut -d/ -f1`
  if [ "${host: -4}" == ".bit" ] ; then
    uri="http${uri:4}"
  elif [ "$host" == "zero" ] ; then
    uri="http${uri:4}"
  else
    uri="http://zero/${uri:7}"
  fi
  xdg-open $uri
fi
